text: The 7th District of the Wisconsin Senate is located in Southeastern Wisconsin, and is composed of parts of Milwaukee County.District Map ==Current elected officials== Chris Larson is the senator serving the 7th district. He was elected in 2010, defeating fellow Democrat Jeffrey Plale in a primary election.Larson Biography The area of the 7th Senate District contains three State Assembly Districts:District Map * The 19th (represented by Jonathan Brostoff) * The 20th (represented by Christine Sinicki) * The 21st (represented by Jessie Rodriguez) The district is also located within Wisconsin's 4th congressional district, which is represented by U.S. Representative Gwen Moore.Congressional District Map ==Past senators== A list of all previous senators from this district:Wisconsin Blue Book, 1991-92 edition, Statistics: History, pages 657-666. {| class=wikitable style="text- align:center" !
